name: CreateProjectEnvironmentVariables
description:
Create or update environment variables for a Vercel project.

This tool creates or updates one or more environment variables for a specified Vercel project. The project can be identified by its `id` or `name`. The tool allows specifying the `key`, `value`, `type`, and `target` of the environment variables. If `upsert=true` is included, existing variables will be updated instead of creating new ones.

parameters.name: project_identifier_or_name
parameters.description: The unique identifier or name of the Vercel project to create or update environment variables for.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: environment_variables
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the environment variables to create or update, including their `key`, `value`, `type`, and `target`.

parameters.name: allow_override_existing_variable
parameters.description: Allows updating the value of an existing environment variable if set to true.

value_schema.description: Allow override of environment variable if it already exists

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of, specified as a string.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug for the project. Used to perform the request on behalf of a specific team.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: upsert
parameters.description: Allow override of environment variable if it already exists

value_schema.description: Allow override of environment variable if it already exists

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name
